attributes.action: Reduce the cost of inter city rail travel to below the cost of making the same journey by car.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Roads are more congested than ever with more attention now being given to the carbon footprint and yet the cost of travelling by rail is prohibitive even on short distances.
Surely the most sensible way forward is large scale investment in our rail network with competitive prices to attract commuters and travellers to use trains rather than cars.
